(Non-VPS offer approved by @mpkossen)

Hi everyone!

If you don’t know me, my name is Jarland and I run an email hosting product named MXroute. The idea here is to blend low price with quality email hosting for your domain so that you can let me do the hard work for you.

Some features:

- Server side filters  
- Webmail (Roundcube, Horde, Squirrelmail)  
- SMTP, POP3, IMAP  
- OwnCloud storage for every email account you create  
- cPanel back end, integrated into WHMCS  
- DNS hosting (requires using cPanel directly)  
- Greylisting  
- Hand-made SpamAssassin filters by yours truly  

All of our packages include:

- Unlimited domains  
- Unlimited email accounts

The only limitation based on the packages would be disk space, which is shared among all of the domains/email accounts that you make under that package. You can allocate storage in any way you see fit, the limit is hit only when actual usage reaches the package limit.
